All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminController
AdminController handles all administrative actions such as managing users and chat rooms.
AppConstants
 
ChatRestController
ChatRestController handles chat room related actions such as creating, adding, and deleting chat rooms.
ChatRoom
ChatRoom Entity, represents a chat room in the application.
ChatRoomController
ChatRoomController handles the operations related to chat rooms, including displaying chat rooms and their messages.
ChatRoomRepository
ChatRoomRepository provides CRUD operations for chat rooms.
ChatRoomService
ChatRoomService handles chat room related actions such as creating, adding, and deleting chat rooms.

Ex5AdiYakobyMichaelZargariApplicationTests
 
MainController
MainController handles the main page, login, signup, and error pages.
Message
Message Entity, represents a message in the application.
MessageController
MessageController handles the sending of messages in the websocket.
MessageDTO
MessageDTO is a data transfer object for chat messages.
MyLogoutHandler
MyLogoutHandler handles the logout operation.
MyUserDetailsService
MyUserDetailsService implements UserDetailsService to load user-specific data.
MyUserPrincipal
MyUserPrincipal implements UserDetails to represent the authenticated user in Spring Security.
SecurityJavaConfig
SecurityJavaConfig configures the security settings for the application using Java configuration.
SetupData
SetupData initializes the database with some initial data.
User
User Entity, represents a user in the application.
UserController
UserController handles user-related actions such as signing up and logging in.
UserDataSession
UserDataSession is a session scoped bean that holds the user's data.
UserRepository
UserRepository provides CRUD operations for users.
UserService
UserService handles user related actions such as registering, banning, and unbanning users.
WebSocketConfig
WebSocket Configuration, configures the WebSocket message broker.
